Dedalus.io_stream.sif_to_graph module¶

this module import a sif file into n igraph graph

class SifToGraph[source]¶

Bases: io_stream.igraph_importer.IGraphImporter

This class parses a simple interaction format (SIF) and converts it into an igraph.Graph object

import_graph(file_name: str, header: bool, sep: str) → igraph.Graph[source]¶

It imports a serialized graph as sif file and converts it into a Graph object

Parameters:
  • sep – The string that separates the list elements in a row
  • header – Whether a header line is present in the file
  • file_name – The name of the adjacency list file
Return type:

Graph: The converted graph
Raises:
  • IOError – When the input file does not exist
  • WrongArgumentError – When the input file does not contain the specified separator
  • UnproperlyformattedfileError – when the input file is not formatted as an edge list
logger = None¶
